attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i have been lead to beleive that serving soldiers are not allowed or i should say the famillies of serving soldiers who have been killed whilst on service protecting their country and our way of life would be unable to claim legal aid to instigate any inquest proceedings and if they decided they would they would have topay for the inquest out of their own money anybody willing to lay down their life for their country should be entitled to the highest financial and legal requirements and should not have the worry of wondering wether they will get the support of the organisation that they are affiliated too.

rejection.details: The title must be a call for action, not your name.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
